items.name: Purchase Product Flow
items.description: Complete checkout flow from browsing products to order confirmation including cart, shipping, and payment
items.reason: Critical revenue path - must work on every deploy

items.name: Add to Cart
items.description: Add products to shopping cart with quantity selection
items.reason: Core shopping functionality, high usage

items.name: Checkout Form Validation
items.description: Validate shipping address fields, payment details, and form submission
items.reason: Payment critical - blocks revenue if broken

items.name: Payment Method Selection
items.description: Select between Credit Card, PayPal, and iDeal payment options
items.reason: Multiple payment paths need verification

items.name: Product Search
items.description: Search products by keyword with results filtering
items.reason: High usage feature, impacts product discovery

items.name: Category Filter
items.description: Filter products by category: Electronics, Accessories, Office Supplies, Furniture
items.reason: Core navigation feature

items.name: Price Range Filter
items.description: Filter products by minimum and maximum price
items.reason: Commonly used filter, affects product visibility

items.name: Rating Filter
items.description: Filter products by star rating (3+, 4+, 5+)
items.reason: Quality filter, medium usage

items.name: User Login
items.description: User authentication with email and password
items.reason: Returns 404 - not implemented on this site

items.name: User Registration
items.description: New user account creation flow
items.reason: Not implemented - login page returns 404

items.name: Product Sorting
items.description: Sort products by name or price (ascending/descending)
items.reason: Medium priority - useful but not critical

items.name: Pagination
items.description: Navigate between product listing pages
items.reason: Required for browsing full catalog

items.name: Add Gift Wrapping Option
items.description: As a shopper, I want to add gift wrapping to my order for an additional fee
items.reason: New permanent feature in checkout flow

items.name: Fix Cart Total Rounding
items.description: Bug: Cart total shows incorrect cents when applying percentage discount
items.reason: Bug fix - verify once, then covered by checkout regression

items.name: Migrate to New Payment Gateway
items.description: Technical: Switch from legacy payment API to new Stripe integration
items.reason: One-time migration - test during rollout only

items.name: Add Express Checkout
items.description: As a returning customer, I want one-click checkout using saved payment methods
items.reason: Permanent feature, alternative checkout path

items.name: Holiday Theme Banner
items.description: Display seasonal promotional banner on homepage during December
items.reason: Temporary seasonal feature

items.name: Wishlist Feature
items.description: As a user, I want to save products to a wishlist for later purchase
items.reason: New permanent feature

items.name: Remove Legacy Discount Codes
items.description: Technical debt: Remove old discount code system after new one is verified
items.reason: Cleanup task - no test needed, just code removal

items.name: Product Reviews
items.description: As a shopper, I want to read and write product reviews
items.reason: Permanent feature, affects purchase decisions
